amendment.description: Amendment requires one-stop centers and providers of training services to meet the specific employment needs of local employers and participants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-92 to insert language from Section 118 (relating to the Local plans of the WIA boards) into two parts of the bill: the Certification of One-Stop Centers (section 121) and Criteria for One-Stop Centers to be eligible for Infrastructure funds (section 122).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 423 - 0 (Roll no. 173).
